directions: [["In a large bowl or container, combine your chicken with the shawarma marinade ingredients. Mix well to coat each piece evenly. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, but overnight is best for maximum flavor."],["When ready to cook, preheat oven to 400 degrees"],["Prepare the vegetables and spread evenly on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and/or oil"],["Place marinated chicken directly on top of the vegetables"],["Bake in preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until chicken is fully cooked"],["Serve with tahini sauce, warm pita, rice, or a fresh salad"],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
